item.title: World's best island greens
item.description: Island greens: Apple of every golfer's eye
item.ExtractedText: << Previous Â Next >> 17th hole at Apple Tree Resort, Yakima, Washington. There are nine raised tee boxes (ranging from 106-180 yards) from which to launch your ball towards this extraordinary-looking green, which is shaped like the "Washington Delicious" apple variety. It is accessed via a bridge positioned to look like a giant stalk, while a leaf-shaped bunker at the back will catch those who overclub and stop their round from going completely pear-shaped.
